title: Size of profile when using email, calendar, and tasks
content: I have been using TBird for many years, but only for email. I have about 15,000 emails and an 18 GB profile. If I start using TB for calendar events and tasks, will that substantially increase the profile size and does that become an unwieldy folder to maintain in terms of errors occurring with time, and in terms of transferring it to a second PC?

title: Imported all mail successfully to new pc BUT now every incoming mail is automatically put in junk folder
content: Got a new pc, loaded Thunderbird on it, and used Thunderbird export/import tool to move everything over; seemed to work fine.... EXCEPT now all my incoming mail automatically gets put in junk folder. I cannot locate any setting that should be causing this. I get quite a lot of different mail in a day, average about 40 and can't find anything online to help me figure out what to do. Should be a simple thing hopefully.

title: Changed Comcast password, now TB can't get in
content:
I changed my Comcast password, and TB won't work and asks me for the new password. I give it my new password, but it doesn't work.

Does Comcast use the same password for my online account as my main email, or are they different?

How can I fix this problem?

PS - I can log on and receive email to me but I can't send email - even to myself. It asks for the password but it doesn't work.

Added - I tried to install TB on a new computer. All I used to have to do is enter my email address and password and it would set it up. Now it says that is has to search for my XFinity ID (it shows my house address), but it can't find my Xfinity ID. Same problem?

title: Thunderbird 115.13.0 cannot connect authenticated user via OAuth2 to Microsoft Outlook365
content:
I've Thunderbird 115.13.0 on Ubuntu 22.04 and I have my email which is configured properly automatically by Thunderbird for IMAP and SMTP servers from Microsoft outlook office 365.

However, now it has problem for both IMAP and SMTP (I can authenticate with OAuth2 in a login page inside Thunderbird without issue).

The issue is:

``` The mail server for account xxx@yyy responded: User is authenticated but not connected ```

My email belongs to an organisation and I don't have admin rights to change anything to authentication.

Any helps would be appreciated for that issue.
creator: a0955057263

title: One POSSIBLE SOLUTION to the mail duplicated in 2 accounts
content:
It was barely noticable, but SERVER NAME in Server Settings was the same for both accounts. These were Yahoo IMAP accounts. Each account had its own folder in Users / ....... / ImapMail, but both accounts were pointing to one folder. Corrected this in the SERVER NAME field in Server Settings (see image)

"SHOULD" solve the issue .......... particulary it is THE ONLY item I can find that was not normal.
creator: mminieri

title: Mozilla Thunderbird - What is ESR?
content:
Hi,

I recently came across the Thunderbird versions are being mentioned as "esr".

In 115.0 version, I see "esr" is added from the 115.10.2esr to 115.14.0esr, the latest version. I also do not see any change in the installers provided. I would like to understand what is the difference between the previous versions and the versions with "esr"?

In 128.0 version, I can see only 128.0.1esr and 128.1.0esr. Is there no normal updates? Now only esr is supproted?

I had version 115.0 installed but I was able to upgrade to 128.1.0esr without any issue. Is this supported?

Regards, Asif

title: My Thunderbird Stopped Working Since Infected by 'tsdtocl.com' also called 'Punchbowl Scam'
content:
I tried to open a 'Punchbowl evite' from a friend, but was required to 'log into my email server again through the evite portal.' RED FLAG. I (stupidly) did, or tried to. The evite never opened, but the friend who appeared to have sent it said her email had been hacked and her whole address book had been receiving these 'Punchbowl evites.' This is an infection or phishing, which has disabled my Thunderbird. Even when I try to read an old AOL email already downloaded to my computer by Thunderbird, this fake AOL log-in page pops up, but at the top it says 'https://tsdtocl.com/'. I tried changing my direct AOL password. I tried blocking this website on Google Chrome using the 'Block Site' extension. Neither had any effect. Thunderbird is still locked out of my AOL, and the fake AOL website keeps popping up.

I would appreciate any advice you can offer.
creator: DorritSaviers1

title: Importar E-mail de ficheiro ZIP
content: Olá, estou a tentar importar um ficheiro com centenas de e-mail para o meu MacBook Pro através de um ficheiro Zip. Sucede que o ficheiro ZIP tem cerca de 4,3 Gb de tamanho e não consigo abrir (o limite é de 2 Gb). Podem ajudar-me ? Antecipadamente grato.
creator: rocha.rogerio.p

title: Problema Download Email no IMAP no Servidor Skymail
content:
Bom Dia, Após eu migrar para o servidor da empresa Skymail, estou tendo problemas em sincronizar algumas contas em IMAP, no qual o Thunderbird não consegue organizar os emails e ele corrompe a visualização do mesmo. No Webmail ele está normal e não tenho problemas com acesso ao mesmo. Coincidência ou não, mas os emails que estão dando este problema são os emails que tem mais de 80Gb. O que eu fiz para ver se melhoraria, era dividir em pastas dos emails por ano, para diminuir o tamanho da ocupação do email, mas não resolveu. No primeiro momento, logo quando implantei, eles pediram para modificar esta configuração:

Editar → Preferências → Avançado → Geral → Editor de Config. Siga o procedimento: Localize uma chave chamada: mailnews.customDBHeaders Mude-a para: Received Após isso reinicie o aplicativo --> Clique com o botão direito na pasta e vá em Propriedades --> Reparar Pasta

Isso deu certo por alguns dias, mas depois começou a ter problemas e mesmo reparando a pasta, mas não adianta. O que eles me alegaram era uma questão de leitura do Thunderbird a data do email no servidor deles, mas continuo com o problema. Eles meio que "lavaram" as mãos, já que no servidor deles está ok e pediram para testar em outro cliente de email. Alguém já passou por este problema? Anexo está a imagem de como fica o email, ficam vários com a data que eu pedi para reparar, mas vazio. Eu já atualizei para a última versão do Thunderbird, mas ainda continua assim.
creator: fernando63

title: Thunderbird backup and restore
content:
I have an IMAP email account with Virgin Media. I have been backing up my Thunderbird email as follows (not sure where I found this method) WIN + R %appdata%/Thunderbird/ Ctrl A Drag all files to External Hard Drive When I open the Backup file there are two files Open 62hcjzp7.default-release (whatever that all means) there are loads of folders one being MAIL Thus contains all my folders from Local folders For every one there is a File and an MSF File How do/Can I restore these to my current version of Thunderbird? I have tried Import from another Thunderbird installation, Profile folder Open the back upp and Select Profiles Tick Mail messages. It says Compete but never copied anything It does create an empty folder under Local Folders in Thunderbird.

My question is can I restore from this backup? If not, what is the best way to backup and restore Thunderbird? Bill

title: Account eliminato
content:
Buon pomeriggio, Nonostante abbia cancellato 2 account (vedi immagini) che non sono più abilitati, Thunderbird continua a richiedere le password di accesso. Le password di accesso non ci sono perche i 2 account non sono più attivi, ecco perche li ho cancellati! Non riesco ad eliminare gli avvisi che appaiono ogni volta che avvio Thunderbird. Ho provato più volte ad disinstallare e reinstallare Thunderbird ma senza successo...è una cosa stressante e non vorrei cambiare il client Thunderbird, per cortesia aiutatemi, grazie.

Saluti Massimo Gagliano
creator: massimo.g1970

title: Thunderbird
content:
Ik gebruik al jaren Thunderbird, en heb diverse keren netjes een financiële bijdrage gegeven. Echter heb ik een groot probleem, en hoop dat u nu iets voor mij kunt betekenen. Ik heb bij provider Telfort(KPN) een mailadres ruud.laurs@telfort.nl Nu is mijn computer gecrasht, en moet ik Thunderbird opnieuw installeren. Echter word er een "wachtwoord" gevraagd, en heb ik deze volgens mij nooit ingevuld, c.q. kan deze niet vinden. Uiteraard zou ik graag een nieuw wachtwoord willen aanmaken, MAAR KRIJG DEZE KEUZE NIET!!! Ik heb in Thunderbird heel veel zaken gearchiveerd, en zou het verschrikkelijk vinden als ik deze niet meer kan terughalen. Kunt u mij alstublieft hiermee helpen, zodat ik "mijn" Thunderbird weer terug krijg! Bij voorbaat dank!

P.s. Dat wachtwoord, moet dat het wachtwoord zijn van je mailprovider, in dit geval Telfort(KPN) of kan dit gewoon een verzonnen wachtwoord zijn (dan weet ik deze niet meer)
creator: ruud.laurs
